title: 僵尸坑 多人闯关地图~
txt_content:
NOTIFICATIONS

- Please Diamond and Favorite this project if you enjoy the ideas and concepts behind it, this will help me and the project out a lot!
- Please don't  redistribute my work without my permission under any circumstances, it  doesn't hurt to ask to film, re-create, or document my projects.
- Subscribe to keep up with latest information on your favorite series!
- There is going to be a part two, Notch Zombies [ Revamped ] which a link will be provided below.
- Check out the new MC Battlefield pvp series which is now out!

MODIFICATIONS

- In-game, set natural spawning mobs to false so they won't interfere with game play!
- In-game, keep the difficulty on Hardcore, don't change it chicken.
- Out-game, make sure to make an backup folder for Notch Zombies, if you don't the map will be deleted upon dying within the game because of Hardcore mode.

ABOUT

Notch Zombies is an zombie adventure survival with elements similar to Call of Duty's Nazi Zombies mode. You kill zombies in exchange for exp which is used to upgrade your weapons and armor. Use teamwork to unlock areas of the map piecing your way out to escape the clutches of the undead. Its highly suggested to play with friends, going solo only leads to one event - death. If you enjoy Notch Zombies, be sure to subscribe and favorite the project, Notch Zombies [ Revamped ] is the veteran and story starter in the series, be sure to download and diamond the project when it is released on November 18th.
NtchZmbz - Original 16.zip

秋风大大翻译
遊戲規則與說明：
1.地圖為極限模式 死亡不可重生
2.遊戲推薦2-8人遊玩
3.使用箭與劍盡可能的打倒殭屍
4.只可以挖礦物類的東西，如：鐵礦、金礦等
5.不可拿走發射器中的蛋
6.不可以破壞建築物
7.可吃東西維持飽健康
8.可以煮食物或合成裝備
9.找到「你贏了」的牌子就過關了
10.發揮團隊合作
